Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute near Randolph/ Stetson
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses rerouted Southbound buses will operate via Wacker & State. Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus & Wacker

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Randolph/ Stetson, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Wacker and State

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute near King Drive/ 73rd
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses rerouted Northbound buses will operate via King Drive, 75th, State, 71st Southbound buses will operate via King Drive, 71st, Lafayette, 75th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near King Drive/ 73rd due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via King Drive , 75th, State, 71st and King Drive

Southbound buses will operate via King Drive, 71st, Lafayette, 75th and King Drive

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Cermak
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Cermak due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Cermak due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
